originalText.text: Literally the most amazing team!! Ben and Natalie went above and beyond to be sure I found the percent apartment. Finding a place to call home in nyc is so difficult especially in this market but they made it their to mission to from the moment we met to find my perfect home. They are so efficient, professional, communicative, prompt, hard working and will do anything to make their clients feel valued by taking a personal interest in such a big investment- and that makes such a difference with who you are working with. In the end, they hustled to lock in my perfect place and I created two new friendships along the way. There is no one else I would trust the way I trust them beyond my real estate needs and would recommend them to anyone and everyone in the city. You guys are the best!! ❤️

originalText.text: My roommates and I worked with Ashley and she was beyond amazing!!! She was extremely professional as well as personable and made sure all of our questions/comments got answered within minutes. She is so kind and I would recommend her to anyone looking for an apartment!

text.text: My roommates and I worked with Ashley and she was beyond amazing!!! She was extremely professional as well as personable and made sure all of our questions/comments got answered within minutes. She is so kind and I would recommend her to anyone looking for an apartment!

originalText.text: My roommate and I worked with Lucas and Ashley to look for apartments in FiDi and they were an amazing help! They sent us videos of the units and took us on a tour which helped us choose a unit really quickly. They answered all our questions with the unit, application, and lease.

text.text: My roommate and I worked with Lucas and Ashley to look for apartments in FiDi and they were an amazing help! They sent us videos of the units and took us on a tour which helped us choose a unit really quickly. They answered all our questions with the unit, application, and lease.

originalText.text:
Sal Carillo was who helped myself and my girlfriend find our new apartment. This is why I would recommend Sal and the impact he made.

-Sal coordinated the unit I had originally wanted to see but also showed me some other units that could have worked based off my criteria. I ended up going with the one he recommended, he nailed it. We have been searching for weeks.
- He walked us through the process and communicated the entire time. We have lived in NYC at a different apartment before but it seems every process always has their nuances. Sal was hands on with an ownership type of attitude throughout everything.

10/10 service and knowledge of the FiDi area, building, unit types, and all the small details that seperate out a typical agent from the great ones.

originalText.text: I would highly recommend having Chris Carillo as your next realtor from Mayell. He was super helpful in helping me find my apartment in NYC. He was very responsive, and catered the apartment search to what I was looking for.
